channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Embedded Finance: Revolutionizing Small Business Operations And Growth
item.description: What exactly does embedded finance mean for small businesses in the U.S.? Answer by Andrew Brown.

item.title: Nexalus Provides A Cool Solution To Cut Data Center Energy Consumption
item.description: An Irish startup has discovered a great way to cut data center energy consumption and use the heat generated by data centers to help communities.

item.title: Why Oxy’s Acquisition Of Holocene Signals A Maturing Carbon Removal Industry

item.title: 8 Major Problems With AI Initiatives In Enterprise
item.description: Think about these eight issues with implementing AI in business and has implications for the future of Enterprise.
